name: layer from horizon
desc: Create a layer based on an input surface and variable elevation value.

properties.name: Surface Definition
properties.desc: The Surface Definition will allow the user to select whether the Selected Surface defines the top or the bottom of the layer.

properties.name: Constant Value
properties.desc: The Selected Surface makes up one surface for the layer, the Constant Value is the elevation of the other surface.

properties.name: Material Name
properties.desc: The Material Name for the newly created layer.

properties.name: Material Number
properties.desc: The Material Number for the newly created layer.

properties.name: Selected Surface
properties.desc: The Selected Surface from the Input Field used to create either the top or bottom of the layer.
